author: القدس العربي
title: Ground News - Christmas under the rubble... it is not only religion. People live
text:
Summary by القدس العربي Last Tuesday, a rocket landed in an area very close to the church building of the abandoned village of Iqrath, located in Upper Western Galilee and close to the Lebanese border. It was reported that a rocket fired from inside Lebanese territory hit the church and caused serious damage. One of the church's sons, who happened to be in its squares, was seriously injured. Some platforms have [...] Share menu More
